subject: disabled auto start
commitMessage:
disabled auto start

Spice-vdagent will be dynamically started by qemu.

Change-Id: Ibfdb0bb618043267c6ffe80fe67cf3738e67ab2e
Signed-off-by: sungmin ha <sungmin82.ha@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

I think spice-vdagentd.service should be modified too.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: modified install path for auto start in emulator
commitMessage:
modified install path for auto start in emulator

Change-Id: I378f83e3137b903164d68bff57648bb6bc8fc384
Signed-off-by: sungmin ha <sungmin82.ha@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

(2 comments)

Why do you want to change the directory from /opt/var/run to /opt/spice ?

/var/run is for run-time variable data.
For information, please check http://www.pathname.com/fhs/pub/fhs-2.3.html

Patch Set 1:

I don't know about tizen filesystem hierarchy standard.

Patch Set 1:

We can't save in /opt/var/run.
Because there is refreshed when emulator is booted with tizen_2.3.

Patch Set 1:

Because /var/run data is refreshed on every booting, we should create such volatile files in /var/run directory
Check all used files in /opt/var/run/spice-vdagentd. pid, sock, log, lock file. They don't need to store in the disk and had better remove  on next boot.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
